page.title: 01General Review of Area
page.content: The area is rural, mainly hill-farming. It includes part of the village of Aberlour, variously known as Charlestown of Aberlour or Aberlour-on-Spey. Aberlour is a planned village, with a wide main street housing shops and tradesmen to serve the surrounding area. The landscape is green and hilly, including patches of pine forest and clumps of birch and other deciduous trees. The river Spey runs through the area, which also includes much of the scattered community of Edinvillie. The A 95 Granton to Elgin road runs through the village.
